title: MediaSource.CreateFromWindowsMedia( WindowsMediaKind soundKind)
body: With the omission of SystemSounds from UWP, it seems that if one would like to play a system sound such as Windows Error (a very common need) then one must include a copy of the sound file in the app for use in MediaPlayer. This is because there are not sufficient access permissions to the C:/Windows/Media directory to load the file from there (unless one uses the overly broad permission to access all user-accessible files).
